Tough: +40 Hit Points
Chronal Shift: R30' Can use a reaction to force an attack, ability, or save reroll 2 times per long rest
Convergent Future: R60' Can suffer 1 level of exhaustion to dictate whether an attack, ability, or save roll succeeds; the exhaustion requires a long rest to remove
Mage Slayer: Can use a reaction to attack an adjacent caster/Foe suffers disadvantage on concentration to maintain a spell in response to a self attack
Violent Attraction: R60' Can use a reaction to inflict +1d10 HP on a weapon target or +2d10 HP on a falling target 3 times per long rest

Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: W: 9 Spell DC: W: 17
Magic Notes:
Adjust Density: R30' Can double or halve the weight of a Huge target, giving -10 or +10 Speed and advantage or disadvantage on Strength, for concentration up to 1 min
Arcane Abeyance: Can store a spell of up to 4th level in a bead (armor class 15; 1 hit point) that can be used to cast the spell within 1 hr once per short rest
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 10 spell slot levels (level 5 maximum) at the end of a short rest once per long rest
Event Horizon: 30' radius inflicts 2d10 HP force and immobility for 1 rd on foes (save Strength inflicts half HP and 1/3 Speed) for concentration up to 1 min once long rest; can spend level 3 spell slots for additional uses
Gravity Well: Can move the target of a successful spell 5'
Momentary Stasis: R60' Can incapacitate a Large target for 1 rd (save Constitution negates) 3 times per long rest
Signature Spells: Can cast 2 chosen W3 spells without spending a spell slot once per short rest
Spell Mastery: Can cast a chosen W1 spell and a chosen W2 spell at will and change the choices after 8 hr of study
Spell Sniper: Can cast attack spells at double normal range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
